page.title: 19Pontrhydyfen-Residents'Views
page.content: Residents were asked their views on living in the village. 59% found nothing they disliked. The other 41% listed 22 different{criticisms}but of these only 5 were listed by more than 4 people.These were: {a) Insufficient facilities and} {activities for youngsters. } {b) Excessive traffic through village.} {c) Lack of shops. {d) Too much forestry. {e) Pensioners annoyed at the delay in {repairing the aqueduct. } It was notable that some of the senior citizens were the only ones who regretted the amount of forestry which had covered the many walks they enjoyed when they were young. 22% of the residents left the like section blank whilst the other 78% listed 21 different reasons for liking their village.
